src:
Concordia vänder - ”Samtliga segment i en positiv trend”
Concordia hade totala intäkter om 259 miljoner kronor under det tredje kvartalet, samma nivå som motsvarande period i fjol. Ebitda-resultatet förbättrades till 52,4 miljoner kronor, från -18,0 miljoner tredje kvartalet 2018.
05 Nov 2019, 12:11 by Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

text:
Concordia turns - "All segments in a positive trend"
Concordia had total revenues of SEK 259 million during the third quarter, the same level as the corresponding period last year. Ebitda earnings improved to SEK 52.4 million, from -18.0 million in the third quarter of 2018.
05 Nov 2019, 12:11 by News Agency Direct
